attributes.action: Call a vote of no confidence in Boris Johnson
attributes.additional_details:
Abraham Lincoln once said “those who would deny freedom to others, deserve it not for themselves” 
Boris Johnson has led a government who have denied freedom and liberties to people under the excuse of protecting the NHS and peoples health.  Firstly the NHS is supposed to protect us not the other way around, if it still can’t do that after nearly two years it never will,  secondly peoples health is a personal responsibility and it is not acceptable to oppress people to protect others.
attributes.background: I want a vote of no confidence to be held, and a new Prime Minister elected who has integrity, and understands the government works for the people, not the other way around.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or for a vote of no confidence.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that.
